header.title: Welcome to Toy Truck
header.subtitle: Want to take a ride on out tipper trucks?

sections.label: Heavy duty car for every job
sections.text: The toy Tatra tipper truck can handle load up to 220lb (100kg) so that not only the kids can have fun with them.

sections.label: High quality truck made in EU
sections.text: The truck is made with very durable and save plastic to ensure a lot of fun play time under any conditions.

sections.label: Safety first...
sections.text: Our trucks are equipped with safety lock so that you can have a smooth ride.

sections.label: Contact us
sections.text: We are currently working on our web shop byt if you can not wait contact us at info@toy-truck.co.uk.
